title: The Dragon Mate's Awakening
description: As Maggie recovers from the plague, standing over her bed is an impossibly sexy man who has been tasked with taking her back home. When he shares just what he is, and who she is to him, she feels like her head is swimming.Torn between old responsibilities and new desires, she weighs the decision to leave her old life behind. Can she put the past behind and find her own way?Book 3 in the Dragongrove series.This is steamy and intended for 18+Librarian's note: See alternate cover edition of ASIN B0792M5S8G here.
author: Imogen Sera
